Description: Large scale inference on EKS using Graviton and Inferentia2

Fn::Join:
#!/bin/bash 
echo 'Executing userdata script ...' | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
chmod 666 /tmp/bootstrap.log; chown ec2-user:ec2-user /tmp/bootstrap.log 
date | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
apt update && apt install -y git | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
cd /home/ubuntu; git clone https://github.com/aws-samples/aws-do-eks.git | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log; cd aws-do-eks; chown -R ubuntu:ubuntu /home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks; git checkout fsdp 
bash -c /home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-aws-cli.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
bash -c /home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-eksctl.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
bash -c /home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-kubectl.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
bash -c /home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-kubectx.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
bash -c /home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-kubeps1.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
bash -c /home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-docker-snap.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
bash -c /home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-python2.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
sudo su ubuntu bash -c '/home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-cloud9.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ubuntu bash -c '/home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-kubeps1.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ubuntu bash -c '/home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-cloud9.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ubuntu bash -c '/usr/local/bin/eksctl create cluster -f /home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/eks-inference-workshop.yaml | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ubuntu bash -c 'source /home/ubuntu/.bashrc; sleep 2; aws eks update-kubeconfig --name eks-inference-workshop | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ubuntu bash -c '/home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/deployment/neuron-device-driver/labels-add.sh | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ubuntu bash -c 'kubectl apply -f /home/ubuntu/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/deployment/neuron-device-driver/neuron2-device-driver-daemonset.yaml | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
date | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
echo 'Done executing userdata script.' | tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log
